messages.title: A Record of Delivery. A Promise of More.
messages.content: Lesley Rollings has a strong record of campaigning locally. As a local councillor rooted in the community she knows our area and the problems we face.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Better buses services for rural communities
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Fighting for better bus services for rural communities.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Improved defences for areas affected by flooding
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Campaigning for improved defences for areas affected by flooding.
Calling for improvement to rural broadband speed to help residents and businesses in the Gainsborough constituency.

issues.environment: Lesley believes passionately in preserving the rural character of our area.

leaflet.personalStatement: Lesley Rollings - the best choice for our next MP. Lesley Rollings lives with her husband, John, in Pilham in the heart of the Gainsborough constituency. She has three grown-up children. Lesley teaches at a local secondary school, where she is responsible for community development. She is passionate about sport and ensuring that our children get the best start in life.

politicalExperience.achievements: Former Mayor of Gainsborough. Campaigning on local issues.

contactInformation.address: Lesley Rollings, The Granary, Green Lane, Pilham, Lincs DN21 3NJ

images.caption: Lesley Rollings campaigning for a second Trent bridge on the A631.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Lesley is fighting for a second Trent bridge on the A631 to boost the local economy.
